about_the_game:
Story
Matt is a 14-year-old secondary school student with a poor family and an ordinary appearance. One day, he was picked on by his classmates during a break. In order to make a fake so as not to attract bad things, he brought some props, and even putted his childhood friend Ma Esther into the danger, came to the haunted house together and pretended to challenge. However, sometimes plans go astray, and some terrible things still happened during the challenge. As for the ending, it's up to "you" to choose.

Character introduction

Name: Zheng Jianuo (Matt)
Age: 14
Introduction: Because of the shadow of childhood, he has a timid personality, and because of some strange behaviors, he has no friends at school. Esther is his only friend. Partial eclipse, he hate carrots, corn and green beans mostly.


Name: Weng Peiqing (Esther)
Age: 14
Introduction: The character is a little more mature than her peers, and her expression changes almost zero when she gets along with others. People think she is a cold person, but it is just her nature, not intentional. Because her mother has to work night shift, she eat with Matt‘s family, and occasionally help him eat dishes he doesn't like.

How to play
"You"just have to use a mouse click or keyboard to play the game. When the game progresses to a certain progress, several options will appear to be chosen, and the options will affect the development of the subsequent plot and even the ending.
Tips: Some endings require playing second round to get through.

Features
-1-1.5 hours game time
-7 beautiful cgs
-6 original background illustrations
-9 original bgm
- Some realistic background illustrations
-Cantonese dubbingThe main character and some important characters are dubbed by the game developer
Pineapple (completely amateur)
- 5 Multiple endings,including NE*2,BE*2,IE*1

content_descriptors.notes: Some plot of the story contains  violence, dead body and blood.
